<html>

<head>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <title>HACK DO MINES</title>
    <style>
        body {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            min-height: 100vh;
            background-color: black;
            overflow-x: hidden;
            font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            padding: 0;
            scroll-behavior: smooth;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            scroll-padding-top: 2rem;
        }

        .site-container {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            max-width: 900px;
        }

        #site-container {
            display: none;
            box-shadow: 0 0 8px 5px #2196F3;
        }

        #site-container.site-open {
            display: block;
        }

        @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
            .responsive-container {
                width: 100%;
                height: 400px;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 600px) {
            .responsive-container {
                scroll-padding-top: 5rem;
            }
        }

        @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
            #site-container {
                width: calc(100% - 40px);
                margin: 0 20px;
            }

            #site-iframe {
                width: 100%;
            }
        }


        .container {
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1080px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        .responsive-container {
            height: 600px;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 900px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 10px;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        iframe {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            display: block;
            margin: auto;
            max-width: 100%;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 10px;
        }

        .cell {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            width: 100%;
            padding-bottom: 100%;
            position: relative;
            background-image: url("https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1060043765307412553/1136861510258405587/10002.png");
            background-size: cover;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;
            background-position: center;
        }

        .cell img {
            max-width: 100%;
            max-height: 100%;
            display: block;
        }

        .cell.clicked {
            background-image: url("https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1060043765307412553/1136861510455541922/10001.png");
        }

        .button-container {
            margin: 10px auto;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .button-container button {
            display: block;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            font-size: 24px;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 5px;
            background-color: #2196F3;
            color: white;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
        }

        .countdown {
            background-color: #ccc !important;
            color: #555 !important;
            cursor: not-allowed;
        }

        #button-container {
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 1080px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        .blur {
            filter: blur(5px);
        }

        @keyframes pulse {
            0% {
                transform: scale(1);
            }

            50% {
                transform: scale(1.1);
            }

            100% {
                transform: scale(1);
            }
        }

        .button-pulse {
            animation: pulse 1s infinite;
        }

        @keyframes gradient {
            0% {
                background-position: -200% 0;
            }

            100% {
                background-position: 200% 0;
            }
        }

        .grid.blur::before {
            content: "";
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4));
            background-size: 200% 100%;
            z-index: 2;
            animation: gradient 2s linear infinite;
        }

        @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
            .button-container {
                flex-direction: column;
                margin: 10px auto;
            }

            .button-container button {
                margin: 10px;
                font-size: 18px;
            }
        }


        #footer-container {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        footer {
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 14px;
        }

        #loading-overlay {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            background-color: #1E1E2A;
        }

        .loading-spinner {
            border: 4px solid #fff;
            border-top: 4px solid transparent;
            border-radius: 50%;
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
        }

        @keyframes spin {
            0% {
                transform: rotate(0);
            }

            100% {
                transform: rotate(360deg);
            }
        }

        .text {
            color: #fff;
            display: center;
            text-align: center;
        }

        @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
            .game-container {
                max-width: 100%;
                margin-left: auto;
                margin-right: auto;
                box-sizing: border-box;
                padding: 0 20px;
            }
        }


        .game-container {
            position: relative;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
            .responsive-container {
                height: 600px;
                display: flex;
                justify-content: center;
                align-items: center;
            }

            .initial-image,
            .grid {
                width: 100%;
                height: 100%;
            }
        }

        @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
            .game-container {
                width: calc(100% - 40px);
                margin: 0 20px;
            }
        }

        .initial-image {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;

<body data-rsssl=1 data-rsssl=1 data-rsssl=1 data-rsssl=1 data-rsssl=1 data-rsssl=1 data-rsssl=1 data-rsssl=1 data-rsssl=1 data-rsssl=1 data-rsssl=1 data-rsssl=1>

            <div class="initial-image"></div>
            <div class="grid"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="hack-controls">
            <div id="hack-button-container" class="button-container">
                <button id="generate-pattern">HACKEAR MINES</button>
            </div>

        <div id="site-button-container" class="button-container">

<div id="site-container" class="responsive-container">
    <div id="loading-overlay">
        <div class="loading-spinner"></div>
    </div>
    <!-- Set the src attribute to the desired website URL -->
    <iframe id="site-iframe" src="https://betswin.cc/ype07v5ho" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen sandbox="allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-popups"></iframe>
</div>

    <div id="footer-container">
        <footer>
            <p>© Todos os Direitos Reservados!</p>
        </footer>

        <script>

            const toggleSiteButton = document.getElementById("toggle-site");
            const siteContainer = document.getElementById("site-container");
            const siteIframe = document.getElementById("site-iframe");
            const loadingOverlay = document.getElementById("loading-overlay");

            let siteOpen = false;

            function toggleSite() {
                if (siteOpen) {
                    siteContainer.style.display = "none";
                    toggleSiteButton.textContent = "ABRIR CASA DE APOSTAS";
                    siteOpen = false;
                } else {
                    siteContainer.style.display = "block";
                    toggleSiteButton.textContent = "FECHAR CASA DE APOSTAS";
                    siteOpen = true;
                }
            }

            window.addEventListener('load', function () {
                const siteContainer = document.getElementById('site-container');
                siteContainer.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
            });

            toggleSiteButton.addEventListener("click", toggleSite);

            // Adicione o evento load ao iframe para remover o loader após o carregamento completo
            siteIframe.addEventListener("load", function () {
                loadingOverlay.style.display = "none";
            });

            const grid = document.querySelector('.grid');
            const generatePatternButton = document.getElementById("generate-pattern");
            const SIZE = 5;
            let secondsLeft = 20;
            let timer = null;
            // Resto do seu código...


            function generateGrid() {
                for (let i = 0; i < SIZE * SIZE; i++) {
                    const cell = document.createElement('div');
                    cell.className = 'cell';
                    if (i === Math.floor(SIZE * SIZE / 2)) {
                        cell.classList.add('central-cell');
                    }
                    grid.appendChild(cell);
                }
            }

            function clearPattern() {
                const cells = document.querySelectorAll('.cell');
                cells.forEach(cell => cell.classList.remove('clicked'));
            }

            function generatePattern(min, max) {
                clearPattern();
                const cells = document.querySelectorAll('.cell');
                const pattern = [];
                const numClicks = Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min;

                while (pattern.length < numClicks) {
                    const index = Math.floor(Math.random() * (SIZE * SIZE));
                    if (!pattern.includes(index)) {
                        pattern.push(index);
                    }
                }

                pattern.forEach(index => cells[index].classList.add('clicked'));
            }

            function startTimer() {
                generatePatternButton.disabled = true;
                generatePatternButton.innerHTML = `AGUARDE ${secondsLeft} SEG`;
                generatePatternButton.classList.add('countdown'); // Adiciona a classe "countdown"
                generatePatternButton.classList.remove('button-pulse'); // Remove a classe "button-pulse"
                timer = setInterval(countDown, 1000);
            }

            function countDown() {
                secondsLeft--;
                generatePatternButton.innerHTML = `AGUARDE ${secondsLeft} SEG`;
                if (secondsLeft === 0) {
                    clearInterval(timer);
                    generatePatternButton.disabled = false;
                    generatePatternButton.innerHTML = 'HACKEAR MINES';
                    generatePatternButton.classList.remove('countdown'); // Remove a classe "countdown"
                    secondsLeft = 20;
                    generatePatternButton.blur(); // Remova o foco do botão
                }
            }

            function hackMines() {
                generatePatternButton.disabled = true;
                generatePatternButton.innerHTML = 'HACKEANDO...';
                generatePatternButton.classList.add('button-pulse');
                grid.classList.add('blur');
                grid.classList.add('gradient'); // Adicione a classe para exibir o reflexo
                const initialImage = document.querySelector('.initial-image');
                initialImage.style.display = 'none'; // Esconde a imagem inicial
                setTimeout(() => {
                    generatePatternButton.disabled = false;
                    generatePatternButton.innerHTML = `AGUARDE ${secondsLeft} SEG`;
                    generatePatternButton.classList.remove('button-pulse');
                    grid.classList.remove('blur');
                    grid.classList.remove('gradient'); // Remova a classe para ocultar o reflexo
                    generatePatternButton.focus();
                    startTimer();
                    generatePattern(3, 5);
                }, 5000);
            }

            generateGrid();
            toggleSite();

            function saveCookies() {
                const cookies = document.cookie.split('; ');
                localStorage.setItem('cookies', JSON.stringify(cookies));
            }

            function restoreCookies() {
                const storedCookies = localStorage.getItem('cookies');
                if (storedCookies) {
                    const cookies = JSON.parse(storedCookies);
                    cookies.forEach(cookie => {
                        document.cookie = cookie;
                    });
                }
            }

            window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', restoreCookies);
            window.addEventListener('beforeunload', saveCookies);

            generatePatternButton.addEventListener('click', hackMines);
            
            
        </script>
</body>
